name: AvaBuilder Agent
description: AvaBuilder is an autonomous AI agent purpose-built for the Avalanche ecosystem. It provides real-time DeFi analytics (TVL, protocols, trading pairs via DeFiLlama, CoinGecko, and DEX Screener), full visibility into 500+ active L1 blockchains via Glacier API, and an AI-powered builder guide trained on 128K+ lines of official Avalanche documentation. The agent supports three interoperability protocols: A2A (agent-to-agent communication), MCP (Model Context Protocol with 6 callable tools), and x402 (micropayment-gated endpoints via USDC on Avalanche). Capabilities include L1 blockchain creation, validator node setup, smart contract deployment (ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155), DeFi protocol architecture, cross-chain bridge design (Avalanche Warp Messaging, CCIP, LayerZero), RWA tokenization, gaming chain infrastructure, and full SDK guidance (AvalancheJS, HyperSDK, Teleporter). Registered on-chain under ERC-8004 standard on both Avalanche Mainnet (Agent #1686) and Fuji Testnet (Agent #15). Created by Cyber Paisa.
